name: Murdock
description:
In Murdock you will experience a world visible only through sound! This visual experience was made during the Coffee Stain Dreamhackathon VR Jam by:

Morgan "Bojkott" Cromell

Pontus "Sajdkick" Björkberg

Gustav "Vulkan" Ekelund

Ivar "Pål Pått" Björling

This game contains four short experiences that loops. Each one taking around 30 seconds.
